list.name: Changes
list.comment:
docs: Add SYSTEM_PROMPT and FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT
Created comprehensive documentation for GitHub-based workflow:
SYSTEM_PROMPT.md: - Complete project overview - Critical rules and reminders - Template for new chat sessions - Quick reference URLs
FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: - Combined MASTER_CONTEXT + PROJECT_STATUS - Single source of truth for project - Complete architecture documentation - All STORIES and development plan - Database schemas - n8n workflows - Deployment guidelines
This enables seamless project continuation across chat sessions by loading project context directly from GitHub.
Usage: Paste SYSTEM_PROMPT.md content or load FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md URL at start of new chat session.
STORY-1 Task 1.2 progress docs: documentation infrastructure complete
